Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "Digicel reported 281 and 29[149] belong to them, the more recent ITU doc 20.I.2017\nagrees and classifies them as fixedLine so we follow that here."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "32, 33, 35 are kept even though they are not in the ITU doc because numbers found\nonline are working."

Label: XML_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "ITU document says numbers with prefix 8 are ""value-added services and free numbers\nwithout making any further distinction. However, http://www.numberingplans.com/ seems\nto suggest they are free."

Label: XML_VOIP
Comment: "ITU document suggests 98\\d{6}, but http://www.numberingplans.com/ restricts it to\n98[89]\\d{5}."
